summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York to defense counsel for Ghislaine Maxwell, attaching two discovery documents: a Rule 404(b) notice and a letter identifying co-conspirators in the Maxwell case. It is part of the pre-trial discovery process.

persons.name: Christian Everdell
persons.context: Appears as a recipient of the email from the prosecution, indicating he is part of Ghislaine Maxwell's defense team.

persons.name: Laura Menninger
persons.context: Appears as a recipient of the email from the prosecution, indicating she is part of Ghislaine Maxwell's defense team.

persons.name: Jeff Pagliuca
persons.context: Appears as a recipient of the email from the prosecution, indicating he is part of Ghislaine Maxwell's defense team.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the discovery documents (404(b) notice and co-conspirator identities) attached to the email, as she was the defendant in the referenced case.

events.title: Prosecution Discovery Submission
events.description: The prosecution prepared and dated two discovery documents: a Rule 404(b) notice and a letter identifying co-conspirators, which were attached to the email sent on October 12, 2021.

locations.name: 1 Saint Andrews Plaza, New York, New York 10007
locations.context: Address of the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, from which the email was sent.

keyFacts: The prosecution in the Ghislaine Maxwell case formally notified the defense of its intent to use 'other acts' evidence under Federal Rule of Evidence 404(b).
The prosecution provided a letter identifying co-conspirators, a key pre-trial disclosure that outlines the alleged conspiracy network.
The communication shows the ongoing discovery process between the U.S. Attorney's Office and Maxwell's defense team in October 2021.
The attached documents (titled 'Maxwell Discovery_Letter (CC_identities)' and 'Maxwell_Rule_404(b)_letter') are referenced but their specific contents are not detailed in this email.
